H2: Resizing SVG files has been made easy by us, start by uploading your file below.
TITLE: Resize SVG online for free- Quickly resize SVG files with just one click
META: Having trouble in resizing SVG images? Our free SVG resizer lets you quickly create desired sizes for images in seconds, saving valuable time in your workflow. Simple and easy to use online tool.

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our Resize SVG online tool resizes the SVG online for free by retaining its quality.
None of your data is sent on our servers; all the operations are performed on the browser itself. This helps us to be 100% safe for our users.
Our Resize SVG online tool works on almost all kinds of browsers and devices.
Our Resize SVG online tool is very easy to understand. No professional is required to work on our tool.
Our Resize SVG online tool is completely free of cost; you can use our tool without paying a single penny.
Our Resize SVG online tool is completely browser-based, and no additional software is required to be downloaded on your device.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to Resize SVG online for free.
steps: Upload the SVG file or Click on the drop-down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive
Adjust the size and style using the options provided.
Adjust the orientation of the SVG file.
Hit the save option to save the changes made.
Download the resized SVG using the download option.
Hurray!!! The resized SVG is ready to rock.

FAQ.question: How can I upload SVG from my drive/dropbox?
FAQ.answer: Click on the drop-down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive. Select the Google account from where you want to link your drive. Now you can select the SVG that you want to upload.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to allow access to my drive?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it is absolutely safe to allow and give us access to your drive. We won't be making any changes to your site, and your SVG will be safe with you.
